Create a Query Object

Source: R/query.R
query.Rd

Create a Query Object

Usage

query(...)

query2(..., call = rlang::caller_env())

Arguments

...

<dynamic-dots> Key-value pairs of query parameters. See Details.

call

The environment from which the function is called.

Value

S7 <class_query> object.

Examples

query(
  first_name  = starts_with("And"),
  middle_name = NULL,
  last_name   = contains("J"),
  state       = any_of("CA", "GA", "NY"),
  state_own   = c("GA", "MD"),
  ccn         = "01256",
  rate        = between(0.45, 0.67),
  year        = 2014:2025)
#> Error in new_object(S7_object(), operator = operator, value = value): Can't construct an object from abstract class <class_modifier>
try(query2())
#> Error in eval(expr, envir) : 
#>   ✖ Query cannot be empty.
try(query2(1))
#> Error in eval(expr, envir) : 
#>   ✖ Query values must be named.
#> ! Unnamed value: 1.
try(query2(a = 1, a = 2))
#> Error in eval(expr, envir) : 
#>   ✖ Query field names must be unique
#> ! Field a appears multiple times.
try(query2(a = 1, or("a")))
#> Error in .f(.x[[i]], ...) : ℹ In index: 1.
#> ℹ With name: a.
#> Caused by error in `new_object()`:
#> ! Can't construct an object from abstract class <class_modifier>
try(query2(a = 1, or("a", "year")))
#> Error in .f(.x[[i]], ...) : ℹ In index: 1.
#> ℹ With name: a.
#> Caused by error in `new_object()`:
#> ! Can't construct an object from abstract class <class_modifier>
try(query2(year = none_of(2000:2020)))
#> Error : <class_query> object properties are invalid:
#> - @year must be <integer>, not <list>

query2(
  first_name  = starts_with("And"),
  middle_name = NULL,
  last_name   = contains("J"),
  state       = c("CA", "GA", "NY"),
  state_own   = c("GA", "MD"),
  ccn         = "01256",
  rate        = between(0.45, 0.67),
  year        = 2014:2025)
#> Error in .f(.x[[i]], ...): ℹ In index: 1.
#> ℹ With name: first_name.
#> Caused by error in `new_object()`:
#> ! Can't construct an object from abstract class <class_modifier>

query2(
  year  = 2018:2025,
  state = c("CA", "GA", "NY"),
  state_owner = c("GA", "MD"))
#> Error in .f(.x[[i]], ...): ℹ In index: 1.
#> ℹ With name: state.
#> Caused by error in `new_object()`:
#> ! Can't construct an object from abstract class <class_modifier>

query2(
  year = 2022:2024,
  state = c("GA", "NY"),
  enrlmt_id = "I20040309000221",
  city = "Atlanta",
  provcity = "Atlanta",
  provider_name = starts_with("C"),
  provname = starts_with("C"),
  provider_first_name = starts_with("An"),
  provider_last_name = contains("JE"),
  practice_state_or_us_territory = c("GA", "FL"),
  practice_size = less_than(10, or_equal = TRUE))
#> Error in .f(.x[[i]], ...): ℹ In index: 1.
#> ℹ With name: provider_name.
#> Caused by error in `new_object()`:
#> ! Can't construct an object from abstract class <class_modifier>
